DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study provide data performance APTIMA HPV Assay use TIGRIS System detect HPV type may cause cervical cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation APTIMA® HPV Assay Using TIGRIS® System
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective clinical trial evaluate APTIMA HPV Assay , use TIGRIS System , cervical cancer screen program . This achieve determine performance assay detect high-risk human papillomavirus ( HPV ) type woman know cervical disease status . The assay evaluate sample population woman ASC-US Pap test result ( `` ASC-US result '' ) woman 30 year age old ( `` 30+ year age '' ) negative ( NILM ) cytology result .
DOC.criteria: Female 21 year old ( ASCUS study ) Female 30 year old ( Adjunct ASCUS study ) Subject attend participate clinic undergoing Pap screen exam clinic visit Ability comprehend sign IRBapproved Informed Consent Form Diagnosis cervical disease ( cancer precancerous condition ) past 12 month Abnormal Pap test result past 12 month Subject 18 year age consent study without presence parent legal guardian Known pregnant Having illness medical condition could interfere affect conduct , result , and/or completion clinical trial Having illness medical condition investigator physician feel would create unacceptable risk subject enrol clinical trial Prior vaccination HPV
